title: So.... does watching LoL Esports help your game?
body:
inb4 lol no u stupid, they are pros, are you better at sports by watching them?

I think that watching pros play in league helps you identify useful habits and tendencies. I think overall people will generally benefit from watching them play IF they try to learn from it and figure out what information they can use.

I don't expect to become a god simply by watching, but I think it is really nice to be able to step back and watch some pros really lay down what the higher end game play looks like, and helps us make better decisions in our own games.
